text: Ralph Pierre LaCock (March 30, 1926 - August 15, 2024), better known by his stage name Peter Marshall , was an American television and radio personality, singer, and actor.Known as Pierre Lacock and born in 1926 (4 years old in April 1930) as per the 1930 United States census He was the original host of The Hollywood Squares, from 1966 to 1981. Marshall was born in Huntington, West Virginia. His sister was actress Joanne Dru.
